content: we love these knit mittens with a convenient flap that folds back to free up your fingers whenever you need them stitched in red heart heat wave this project offers extra warmth since the yarn is activated by sunlight with such a unique spin on your basic mittens simply select a variety of shades for unique gifts that will be appreciated by the whole family materials set of 4 sizes u s 7 4 5 mm and u s 8 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles
